name: ZAVOD
description:
ZAVOD is a post-industrial survival-horror that plunges you into the darkness of dead factories and silent machines. Plunging into the underground labyrinths under the great factory, you will find yourself in total darkness, which reminds you that once life was in full swing here, but now - apart from rats scurrying everywhere and the remnants of former life, there is nothing here ... Or not?
Get deep into the factory, study its communication system, find things that will help you in this difficult task, follow all safety instructions and beware of what is hidden in the depths of the factory...
